channel.title: Field Manuals on Analyst
channel.description: Recent content in Field Manuals on Analyst

item.title: BTFM iOS
item.description: Device Info Get UDID in different ways (using MacOS): ioreg -p IOUSB -l | grep "USB Serial" idevice_id -l # get UDID with ideviceinstaller system_profiler SPUSBDataType | sed -n -e '/iPad/,/Serial/p;/iPhone/,/Serial/p;/iPod/,/Serial/p' | grep "Serial Number:" # instruments -s devices brew install libimobiledevice # install the tool ideviceinfo brew install libimobiledevice # install the tool idevicedebug -d run [app_name] Get BootROM version (old or new).

item.title: RTFM iOS
item.description: Paths cd /private/var/mobile/Containers/Data/Application/[application_GUID] # application local storage cd /var/mobile/Containers/Bundle/Application/[application_GUID]/[application_name].app/[application_name] # application binary, some iOS versions cd /var/containers/Bundle/Application/[application_GUID]/[application_name].
